premise_source_doc_sentence: Produced by DiC Animation City , Inc. , the series starred pre-teen movie star Macaulay Culkin .

claim: Home Alone does not star Macaulay Culkin.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The first two films , Home Alone  (  1990  )  and Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York  (  1992  )  , follow the adventures of a boy named Kevin McCallister  (  Macaulay Culkin  )  who , during the course of the film , gets burglars Harry  (  Joe Pesci  )  and Marv  (  Daniel Stern  )  arrested by using booby traps .

premise_source_doc_sentence: It was originally conceived as a non-working prop for the 1992 movie Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York , used by the main character Kevin McCallister  (  Macaulay Culkin  )  .

claim: Home Alone does not star Macaulay Culkin.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Wish Kid starring Macaulay Culkin  (  often referred to simply as Wish Kid  )  is an American animated television series that originally aired on Saturday mornings from September 14 , 1991 , through July 1992 on NBC , although a few repeats aired from 1998 , through 2002 on Toon Disney after that .
